content.question: Matt wants to investigate the opinions of young adults in the country, ages 18 years to 25 years, about time spent playing video games. He plans to administer a survey to a sample of people. Which of the following samples is most likely to generalize to his population of interest?

choices.label: A nationwide sample of people ages 18 to 25
A sample of attendees of a gaming convention
A sample of people ages 18 to 25 in Mattâ€™s hometown
A sample of people who click on a link in an online gaming site
A sample of people who buy video games from an online store

content.answer: A nationwide sample of people ages 18 to 25

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Make an appropriate claim or draw an appropriate conclusion.
